name: German Trucking
overview: A game in which you manage a trucking company in Germany. First published commercially in 1992 by OASE, updated versions of GERMAN TRUCKING (sans printed manual) were subsequently released as shareware in 1993/94 by developers DGM-Software. Known releases: - V1.0 (1992) - V2.0 (1993/94) - V2.1 (22-Sep-94)
